p: Standards of flavonoids (scutellarin, baicalin, baicalein, wogonin, wogonoside, luteolin, chrysin), verbascoside, sugars (glucose, fructose, xylose, galactose, rhamnose, sucrose and cellobiose) and organic acids (quinic, malic, ascorbic, succinic, citric, Î±-keto-glutaric, oxalic and tartaric), methanol and acetonitrile (HPLC gradient grade) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Darmstadt, Germany). Water was obtained from Milipore Milli-Q Gradient water purification system (Barnstead, US).
